hero.description: A software developer who loves problem-solving, embraces continuous learning, and enjoys exploring new technologies

description.part1: I enjoy taking an active role in every stage of software development. I work across a wide spectrum, from frontend to backend, database management to system architecture.
description.part2: I love transforming complex problems into simple and effective solutions. Using my analytical thinking and logical reasoning skills, I strive to find the most optimal solution in every project.
description.part3: To keep up with the rapid changes in the technology world, I continuously improve myself and learn new tools and methodologies.

points.title: Problem Solving
points.description: Analyzing complex problems and producing effective solutions

points.title: Continuous Learning
points.description: Passion for discovering new technologies and methodologies

points.title: Full Stack Development
points.description: Comprehensive experience in frontend and backend technologies

points.title: Analytical Thinking
points.description: Logical approach and systematic problem solving
